en-US.summary: Pick a random student from your classes
en-US.name: PickOn.Me - Random Student Picker
en-US.description: Pick a random student from your classes. Visit https://pickon.me to set up.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
Sign into the website with Google and create a class list on the website. A Google account with sample data has been created with email "alexaopenrandomstudent@gmail.com" and password "alexa2019".

Response to previous feedback: buttons for class periods on the home screen are not "cropped", they can be scrolled through horizontally by swiping across the display.
